metadata.name: Dism Remove Online Package
metadata.comment: Deployment Image Servicing and Management tool. DISM is used to enumerate, install, uninstall, configure, and update features and packages in Windows images

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\dismhost.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('/online')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('/disable-feature')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\dism.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/online')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/disable-feature'))))

output.summary: Deployment Image Servicing and Management tool. DISM is used to enumerate, install, uninstall, configure, and update features and packages in Windows images
